snippet: Once a bastion of old European classical music, the season’s concert events in Katonah now include youthful chamber ensembles and international artists.
abstract: Offerings at the Caramoor International Music Festival, once a bastion of old European classical music, now reflect the youthful vision of Michael Barrett, who took over as chief executive and general director of the Caramoor Center for Music and the Arts in Katonah in 2003 (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: Once a bastion of old European classical music, the season’s concert events in Katonah now include youthful chamber ensembles and international artists.

headline.seo: A Preview of Caramoor International Music Festival, in Katonah
headline.main: Caramoor Festival Marked by a Director’s Imprint
headline.print_headline: Caramoor Festival Marked by a Director’s Imprint
